bibl.title: State Archives in Graeco-Roman Egypt from 30 BC to the Reign of Septimius Severus.
bibl.note: "Our purpose in (1) to see what type of transaction was recorded; (2) where; (3) who had access to the record; (4) how copies were obtained, by whom, and for what purpose; (5) whether the system of state archives in Egypt. can tell us anything about the system elsewhere in the Roman Empire, whether in Rome or in the provinces."
Cockle Walter E.H., State Archives in Graeco-Roman Egypt from 30 BC to the Reign of Septimius Severus.
